titleStmt.title: An answer to two books the first being stiled a reply to Sir Thomas Mainwaring's book, entituled, An answer to Sir Peter Leicester's Addenda, the other stiled Sir Thomas Mainwaring's law-cases mistaken / written ... Sir T.M.
titleStmt.author: Mainwaring, Thomas, Sir, 1623-1689.

notesStmt.note: Leicester's Addenda is the addition to his Historical antiquities.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
